# Overview


(THEORY)

# Setup

```{r load necesssary packages, echo = FALSE}

# general tools
library(tidyverse)  #data manipulation
library(here) #making directory pathways easier on different instances
here::here() # here() starts at the root folder of this package.
library(devtools)

# table aesthetics
library(scales)
library(patchwork)
library(grid)
library(formattable)
library(kableExtra)

```

# IVR risk table

```{r read in table}

IVR_risk_table <- read.csv(file = file.path(here::here(), "vignette-outputs", "data-tables", "IVR_risk_table_global_regional_ensemble.csv"), row.names = 1)

```

```{r format table}

IVR_risk_table[1, ] <- proportion_bar("darkred")(IVR_risk_table[1, ])
IVR_risk_table[2, ] <- proportion_bar("darkorange")(IVR_risk_table[2, ])
IVR_risk_table[3, ] <- proportion_bar("gold")(IVR_risk_table[3, ])
IVR_risk_table[4, ] <- proportion_bar("gray")(IVR_risk_table[4, ])

# print table, e.g., in html format
IVR_risk_table <- kable(IVR_risk_table, "html", escape = FALSE) %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = FALSE) %>%
  add_header_above(., header = c("(down) historical risk" = 1, "risk due to climate change (2055)" = 4), bold = TRUE) %>%
  add_header_above(., header = c("Risk of L delicatula establishment in globally important viticultural regions" = 5), bold = TRUE)

  
```

```{r save table from above, if desired}

if(TRUE) {
  
  # save as .html
  kableExtra::save_kable(
    IVR_risk_table, 
    file = file.path(here::here(), "vignette-outputs", "figures", "IVR_risk_table_global_regional_ensemble.html"),
    self_contained = TRUE
    )
  
  # initialize webshot by 
 # webshot::install_phantomjs()
  # convert to pdf
  webshot2::webshot(
    url = file.path(here::here(), "vignette-outputs", "figures", "IVR_risk_table_global_regional_ensemble.html"),
    file = file.path(here::here(), "vignette-outputs", "figures", "IVR_risk_table_global_regional_ensemble.png")
  )
    
}

```

# SLF risk table
